title: Probably custom made but what does it look like (to you)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/marmo_4393.jpg)
it’s from a card ad from the 20s.. so my idea that it looks a bit like nutrafont is not an option!!

xo
author: MargotHoltman

comments.content:
I’d pick Avant Garde Gothic, which might have been based on something from this era.

- Mike Yanega

Mostra would be a nice alternative.

- Lex

...and Bernhard Gothic has a similar ’R’.

- Lex

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091126054735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typooo_6585.jpg)

maybe you can help me out with this one.. also really old.. from the 20s..

xo

Probably hand-drawn. Nick’s Fonts has a number of similar styles.

- Lex
